title: S'more Cookbook: Tasty Creative S'more Recipes
description: S’mores are an essential part of camping and can you imagine how much better you could make this tasty treat! With the help of this Smore Cookbook the answer is provided with 30 simple and easy smore recipe twists including holiday recipes and “spirited” s’mores - which will leave you begging for more! Try delectable desserts like S’mores Whoopie Pies, S’mores Cupcakes and Peanut Butter S’mores Brownie and many more. This book also offers some added bonuses such as safety tips, clean-up tips plus more. The size of this book is so handy, it’s convenient to take with you on any outing!Grab your copy of this Smore Cookbook today!
author: Stephanie Sharp
